en: Private Military Contractors Bolster Russian Influence in Africa
sna: Makambani Echiuto Akazvimiririra Anowedzera Guhu ReRussia muAfrica

en: Russia's geopolitical ambitions in Africa have in recent years been backed by private military contractors, often described as belonging to the "Wagner group" an entity with no known legal status.
sna: Zvishuvo zveRussia kuti ive nechekuita munezvematongerwo nematunhu emuAfrica mumakore achangodarika zvanga zvichitsigirwa makambani echiuto akazvimiririra, ayo vanowanzotsanangurwa semuchikwata chinonzi "Wagner group" sangano risina chimiro kana mashandiro anozivikanwa zviri pamutemo.

en: Most recently, Western nations have condemned the alleged arrival of Russian mercenaries in Mali's capital Bamako, a claim denied by the junta that seized power in 2020.
sna: Munguva ichangodarika, nyika dzekumaodzanyemba dzakashora kusvika muguta guru reMali, Bamako, kwevarwi vemakambani echiuto akazvimiririra anonzi ndeekuRussia, izvo zviri kurambwa nemasoja akabvuta masimba munyika iyi muna2020.

en: As relations with France worsen, the military rulers may be looking for ways to make up for shrinking numbers of European troops fighting Mali's years-old jihadist insurgency.
sna: Panguva apo hukama neFrance huchiramba huchishata, vatongi vechiuto ava vanogona kunge vachitsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekuvhara gwanza riripo nekuda kwekuderera kuru kuramba kuchiitika kwemauto anobva kuEurope anga achirwisana nekumukira kwemakore kwechi jihad muMali

en: Mercs [mercenaries] working in Africa is an established norm thanks in part to decades of operations by contractors from South Africa, said Jason Blazakis of the New York-based Soufan Group think tank.
sna: Varwi vemakambani echiuto akazvimiririra anonzi maMercs [kana kuti mercenaries] vanoshandira muAfrica yatova garoziva, zvichibva muchikamu pamakore nemakore emabasa aiitwa nemakambani echiuto akazvimiririra ekuSouth Africa, akadaro Jason Blazakis wesangano rekuNew York renyanzvi dzekuongorora nekunzvera rinonzi Soufan.

en: The Wagner folks are walking through a door that has long been open to their ilk, he added.
sna: Shasha dzeWagner idzi dziri kupinda nepamagonhi anga agara akazarurirwa kuvanhu verudzi nemabasa avo, akapamhidzira achidaro.

en: No information is publicly available about the group's size or finances.
sna: Hapana vakaturwa zviri pachena pamusoro pekukura kwesangano iri kana hwuwandu hwemari yaiinayo.

en: But around Africa, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) in Washington has found evidence since 2016 of Russian soldiers of fortune in Sudan, South Sudan, Libya, the Central African Republic (CAR), Madagascar and Mozambique.
sna: Asi mukati meAfrica, sangano rinoita zvidzidzo neongororo yezvenzira dzekuita zvinhu dzakatesvera uye kuongorora zvomoitika munyika dzakasiyana siyana reCenter for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) riri muWashington rakawana humboo kubva muna 2016 hwemauto anobva kuRussia anoita basa nekuti abhadharwa zvisineyi nechikonzero chacho achiwanikwa muSudan, South Sudan, Libya, the Central African Republic (CAR), Madagascar neMozambique.

en: Botswana, Burundi, Chad, the Comoros, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo-Brazzaville, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Nigeria and Zimbabwe are also on the CSIS's list.
sna: Botswana, Burundi, Chad, the Comoros, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Congo-Brazzaville, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Nigeria and Zimbabwe are also on the CSIS's list.

en: In Africa "there is a convergence of many states' interests, including China's," Alexey Mukhin of the Moscow-based Centre for Political Information told AFP.
sna: MuAfrica "maita kusangana nekuvhengana kwezvido zvenyika dzakawanda, kusanganisira zvido zve China," Alexey Mukhin anoshana nesangano rinongorora zvemashoko ezvematongerwo riri muMoscow rinonzi Centre for Political Information akaudza AFP.

en: Every state has the right to defend its business assets, he added.
sna: Nyika yega yega ine kodzero yekudzivirira hupfumi nezvinokosha zviri mairi, akaenderera mberi achidaro.

en: Hysteria'
sna: Kuvhumuka'

en: Wagner does not officially exist, with no company registration, tax returns or organizational chart to be found.
sna: Wagner hairarami kana kushanda zviri pamutemo, haina kunyoreswa sekambani, haibhadhari mitero kana kuva nezvinyorwa zvinoratidza kuti ndiani anoita chii zvinogona kuwanikwa kana kuzivikanwa.

en: When the EU wanted to sanction the group in 2020, it targeted Russian oligarch Yevgeny Prigozhin, an ally of President Vladimir Putin who is suspected of running Wagner.
sna: EU payakada kurova boka iri nezvirango zvemari muna 2020, yakabva yananga mbozha yekuRussia inotsigira hutongi hweko anonzi Yevgeny Prigozhin, uyo anowirirana nemutungamiriri weRussia, Vladimir Putin uye achifungidzirwa kuti ndiye muridzi weWagner.

en: It imposed further sanctions in December last year when mercenaries' arrival in Mali appeared certain drawing accusations of "hysteria" from Moscow.
sna: Yakazowedzera zvimwe zvirango munaZvita gore rakapfuura apo kusvika kwevarwi vemakambani echiuto aya muMali kwakanga kwava pachena, asi Russia ikabva yati vanhu vaitaura izvi vakange vachi "vhumuka".

en: Western experts say military contractors are embedded in Russia's official forces like intelligence agencies and the army, providing plausible deniability for Moscow.
sna: Nyanzvi mune zvechiuto munyika dzekumaodzanyemba dzinoti makambani echiuto aya anenge akasimwa muzvikwata zvekuzvidzivirira zvenyika zvakaita sezvevasvori nemauto, izvo zvinoita kuti kuramba kweRussia kuti kune makambani echiuto akazvimiririra kuve nyore kukugamuchira.

en: Their deployment to African countries aims to "enable Russia to... regain this sphere of influence" that fell away with the collapse of the Soviet Union, said CSIS researcher Catrina Doxsee.
sna: Kutumirwa kwawo kunyika dzemuAfrica kune chinangwa 'chekubatsira Russia kuti... Idzokere nekuwana zvakare chinzvimbo chekuva nesimba pamusoro pezvinoitwa kana kuronga" chinova chinzvimbo chadonha nekurasika panguva yekuarara kwemubatanidzwa wenyika zhinji dzainzi Soviet Union, akadaro munzveri weCSIS, Catrina Doxsee.

en: The mercenaries' presence has been growing even faster since a 2019 Russia-Africa summit.
sna: Huvepo hwevashandi emakambani emauto eya hwange huchiwedzera nekukasirisa, kubva pakaitwa musangano mukuru weRussia nenyika dzemuAfrica muna 2019.

en: Moscow has been active "especially in what has traditionally been France's zone of influence" in former colonies like CAR and Mali, said Djallil Lounnas, a researcher at Morocco's Al Akhawayn university.
sna: Russia yange ichiita basa "zvikuru sei munzvimbo dzaisivikanwa sekuti dzinorunzirwa neFrance" munyika dzaive pasi pehutongi hweFrance dzakaita seCAR neMali, akadaro Djallil Lounnas, munzveri anoshanda ari pachikoro chepamusoro soro muMorocco cheAl Akhawayn university.

en: While military contractors sometimes shepherd Russian arms sales, the revenue "really pales compared with the profit they are able to generate from mining concessions and access to natural resources," Doxsee said.
sna: Kunyangwe hazvo makambani echiuto akazvimiririra aya dzimwe nguva achifambisa kutengeswa kwezvombo zvinogadzirwa neRussia "mari inopinda apa haina chainoreva kana ichizoenzaniswa nemari svinu yavanogona kuburitsa kubva pamvumo pakuchera migodhi kana kodzero yekushandisa zviwanikwa zvinokosha munyika," Doxsee akadaro.

en: That makes unstable countries with mineral or hydrocarbon wealth prime customers such as in Syria where the mercenaries first became known to the wider public.
sna: Izvi zvinoita kuti nyika dzisina kugadzika asi dziine zvicherwa kana hupfumi hwemafuta dzive nyika dzine hufpimi dzingada kuitirwa basa nemauto aya, sekuSyria uko vakrwi ava vakange vozivikanwa nevanhuwo zvavo eruzhinji rwemunyika.

en: No questions asked
sna: Hapana mibvunzo inobunzwa

en: Lounnas said that another advantage for clients is a lack of friction over human rights and democracy that might come with Western partners.
sna: Lounnas akati chimwe chakanakira vanoitirwa basa ndechekusazonetsana panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu negutsaruzhinji zvinogona kuuya nemakambani anobva kunyika dzekumavirira.

en: Russia has its interests. It doesn't ask questions, he added.
sna: Russia ine zvainodawo. Haibvunze mibvunzo, akapamhidzira achidaro.

en: Reports of violence and abuse on the ground suggest that same latitude may extend to the mercenaries themselves.
sna: Kutaurwa kwehutsinye nechisimba chinokuvadza nekubatwa zvisina kunaka kwevanhu kunopa pfungwa yekuti kuda izvi ndizvowo zvinoitwa kuvarwi vemakambani akazvimiririra pachezvavo.

en: In the CAR, the United Nations is probing an alleged massacre during a joint operation by government forces and Wagner fighters.
sna: MuCAR, United Nations iri kuferefeta kuurayiwa kwevanhu vazhinji panguva imwe chete pabasa remubatanidzwa wemauto vehurumende nevarwi veWagner.

en: One military source told AFP that more than 50 people died, some in "summary executions."
sna: Mumwe munhu ari muchiuto akaudza AFP kuti vanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu vakafa, vamwe "vachifa vachiitwa zvekupfurwa nepfuti."

en: On Thursday, the European Union said it would not resume military training in the CAR suspended since mid-December unless the country's soldiers stop working for Wagner.
sna: Nemusi weChina, sangano reEuropean Union yakati yakange isiri kuzosimudzira kudzidziswa kwezvechiuto CAR izvo zvakange zvambomiswa pakati paZvita "kusvikira mauto emunyika umu arega kushandira Wagner."

en: Meanwhile the mercenaries' results do not always measure up to the hopes of the governments that hire them.
sna: Zvichakadai zvinoitwa nezvikwata zvemauto ekunze aya hazviwanzoenderana nezvinenge zvichitarisirwa nehurumende dzinenge dzavapa mabasa ekuita.

en: In Libya, Russian mercenaries suffered heavy losses in Marshal Khalifa Haftar's year-long attempt to conquer the capital Tripoli, which was ultimately unsuccessful.
sna: MuLibya, varwi vemakambani echiuto akazvimiririra ekuRussia akarasakirwa nehupenyu nezvishandiswa mukuedza kwegore rose kwaMarshal Khalifa Haftar kuti akunde nekutora guta guru reTripoli, chakazova chinhu chisina kuzobudirira pakupedzesera.

en: And in Mozambique, the Russians retreated in the face of Islamic State group jihadists, ultimately losing out to South African competitors.
sna: Uye muMozambique, varwi vekuRussia ava vakadududza vatarisana nevarwi vechi ihad veboka reIslamic State group jihadists, vachibva vatorerwa basa nevanovakwikwidza nekuSouth Africa.

en: Although lacking language skills and experience with the terrain, Wagner "were picked because they were the cheapest", Doxsee said.
sna: Kunyangwe vasingagone mutauro wemunyika kana kunzwisisa mamiririro akaita nzvimbo yavanoshandira, mauto eWagner "akasarudzwa nekuti ndivo vakange vaine mari yakanyanya kuderera kudarika vamwe vose", akadaro Doxsee.

en: They didn't have what it took to succeed, she added, noting that "they've had a fair few failures" across Africa.
sna: Vakange vasina zvinoita kuti vabudirire, akawedzera achidaro, achitiwo "vakasangana nekukonewa kwati wandeyi" muAfrica yose.

en: Succeeding completely might actually harm the mercenaries' business model, which thrives on unrest, conflict and crisis.
sna: Kubva vakunda nekubudirira zvachose kunogona kukanganisa mafambisirwe anoitwa bhizimisi remauto emakambani akazvimiririra nekuti bhidhauko ravo riri pane mhirizhonga, kurwisana nemvongamupopoto.

en: If a country such as the CAR hires them to train forces, to help them in their military efforts, its in their interest to accomplish that just well enough to continue to be employed, Doxsee said.
sna: Kana nyika yakaita seCAR ikavakumbira kuti idzidzise mauto ayo, kuibatsira mumabasa nehurongwa hwayo hwechiuto, zvinenge zvichizovanakira kuti vaite nekupedzesa mabasa aya zvakanaka kuti vagone kuenderera mberi vari pabasa, akadaro Doxsee.

en: If they actually were to do it well enough to resolve the conflict, they would no longer be needed.
sna: Deno kuri kuti vanobva vaita basa racho nemazvo zvekubva vapedza hondo, zvaizoreva kuti havaizonge vachitsvagwa zve kuti vaite basa.

en: Cyclone Batsirai Weakens After Hitting Madagascar, Floods Feared
sna: Dutu Rinonzi Batsirai Rinopera Simba Mushure Mekurova, Mashamu Otyirwa

en: Cyclone Batsirai weakened overnight but floods were still expected due to heavy rain after it hit eastern Madagascar with strong winds, the island's meteorological office said Sunday.
sna: Dutu rinonzi Batsirai rakapera simba munguva yemanheru asi kunyangwe zvakadaro mashamu achiri kutarisirwa nekuda mvura yakasimba yakanyay kumabvazuva eMadagascar aine mhepo isine simba guru, bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze muchitsuwa ichi akadaro nemusi weSvondo.

en: Batsirai has weakened, Meteo Madagascar said, adding that the cyclone's average wind speed had almost halved to 80 kph, while the strongest gusts had scaled back to 110 kph from the 235 kph recorded when it made landfall on Saturday evening.
sna: Batsirai yaderea simba rayo, Meteo Madagascar yakadaro, asi ndokuzotiwo kumhanya kwedutu iri kwakange kwadupuka zvekugurwa nepakati ravakufamba mutunhu wemamaira makumimasere muawa rimwe chete, uyewo mhepo yakange yadzikira kusvika pakufamba mutunhu wezana negumi remamaira muawa rimwechete kubva pamamaira mazana mairi nemakumi matatu nemashanu paawa akaonekwa dutu parakamhara muchitsuwa ichi nemusi weMugovera manheru.

en: The cyclone, the second storm to hit the large Indian Ocean island nation in just a few weeks, was moving westwards at a rate of 19 kph, the meteorological services said.
sna: Dutu iri, rinova rechipiri kurova chitsuwa chikuru ichi chiri mugungwa reIndian Ocean mumasvondo mashomanana, rakakange rakananga kumavirazuva richifamba zvekusvika mutunhu wemamaira gumi nemasere paawa rimwe chete, bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze rakadaro.

en: But "localized or generalized floods are still feared following the heavy rains," it said, adding that Batsirai should emerge at sea in the Mozambique Channel later Sunday.
sna: Asi "madutu anenge ari epanzvimbo imwe chete kana anenge akapararira munzvimbo dzakasiyana siya" anowanzotyirwa kuti anoitika mushure kwekunaya kwemvura zhinji" yakadaro ichitiwo Batirai yaigona kuzotangawo munyanza muchikamu chakatarisana nenyika yemozambique chinonzi Mozambique Channel zuva roda kurereka nemusi weSvondo.

en: Batsirai made landfall in Mananjary district, more than 530 kilometers southeast of the capital Antananarivo, around 8 p.m. local time (1700 GMT) Saturday.
sna: Batsirai yakamhara mudunhu reMananjary, mutunhu unodarika makiromita mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nechekuchamhembe kwakadzivira kumabvazuva eguta guru reAntananarivo, munguva dzesere mauro (kana kuti kuti nenguva dzeshanu zuva rodoka pachishandiswa chieranguva cheGeneral Meridian) neMugovera.

en: It reached the island as an "intense tropical cyclone", packing winds of 165 kph, Faly Aritiana Fabien of the country's disaster management agency told AFP.
sna: Rakange rasvika muchitsuwa "sedutu rakasimba" riine mhepo dzaimhanya zvekusvika muawa rimwe chete kumatunhu ari kure zvemamaira zana nemakumi matanhatu ane mashanu, Faly Aritiana Fabien uyu anoshanda pasi bebazi rinoona nezvekunatsira munguva dzetsaona nenjodzi munyika akaudza AFP.

en: The national meteorological office has said it fears "significant and widespread damage."
sna: Bazi rinoona nezvemamiriro ekunze munyika rakange rati rinotyira "kuparadzwa kukuru uye kwakapararira munzvimbo dzakawanda."

en: Just an hour and a half after it first hit land, nearly 27,000 people had been counted as displaced from their homes, Fabien said.
sna: Kwangopera awa rimwe chete nechidimbu, rakabva ramhara ndokutanga kurakasha, vanhu vangasvike zviuru makumi mavu nemanomwe vakange vaverengwa seavo vakange vabviswa kubva pamisha yavo, akadaro, Fabien.

en: He said his office has accommodation sites, food and medical care ready for victims, as well as search and rescue plans already in place.
sna: Vakati hofisi yavo yakange yagadzirira nekurongedza nzvimbo dzekugara, zvekudya nemishonga kuitira vanenge vakanganuswa nedutu iri, uewo patove nehurongwa hwekutsvaga nekudzikunura hwakatomirira kushandiswa.

en: Very serious threat'
sna: Njodzi Huru'

en: The Meteo-France weather service had earlier predicted Batsirai would present "a very serious threat" to Madagascar, after passing Mauritius and drenching the French island of La Reunion with torrential rain for two days.
sna: Sangano rinoongorora mamiriro ekunze rekuFrance reMeteo-France rakange rafanotaura kuti raitarisira kuti Batsirai raizounza "njodzi huru" kuMadagascar, mushure mekupfuura nemuMauritius uye nekupura nemubvumbi chitsuwa chiri pasi peFrance chinonzi La Reunion kwemazuva maviri.

en: In the hours before the cyclone hit, residents hunkered down in the impoverished country, still recovering from the deadly Tropical Storm Ana late last month.
sna: Mumaawa mashona dutu risati rarova, vagari vakahwarara pasi munyika yakaromboka iyi vachiri kumbopora kubva mumavanga edutumupengo rine njodzi rinonzi Tropical Storm Ana mukupera wemwedzi wakapfuura.

en: In the eastern coastal town of Vatomandry, more than 200 people were crammed in one room in a Chinese-owned concrete building.
sna: Muguta reVatomandry iro riri kumabvazuva kumhenderekedzo egungwa, vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri vakange vakapakirana mubandiko rimwe chete mune chimwe chivakwa chekongiri chechizvarwa chekuChina.

en: Families slept on mats or mattresses.
sna: Mhuri dzakarara parupasa nepamametiresi asina mibhedha.

en: Community leader Thierry Louison Leaby lamented the lack of clean water after the water utility company turned off supplies ahead of the cyclone.
sna: Mutungamiriri we munzvimbo Thierry Louison Leaby akakungura kushaikwa kwemvura yakachena mushure mekunge kambabi inooona nezvemvura muguta yadzima mvura ichigadzirira kuuya kwedutu iri.

en: People are cooking with dirty water, he said, amid fears of a diarrhea outbreak.
sna: Vanhu vari kubika nemvura inesvina, akadaro, paine kutyira kupararira kwechirwere chemanyoka.

en: Outside plastic dishes and buckets were placed in a line to catch rainwater dripping from the corrugated roofing sheets.
sna: Pazhe, madhishi namabhagidhi epurastiki akange akiswa mumitsara akateedza achichingidzira mvura yaidonhakuvha kumarata ekapfirira matenga edzimba.

en: The government must absolutely help us. We have not been given anything, he said.
sna: Hurumende inosungirwa kuti batsira zvachose. Hatina chatati tapihwa, akadaro.

en: Residents who chose to remain in their homes used sandbags and yellow jerrycans to buttress their roofs.
sna: Vagari vakasarudza kuramba vari mudzima dzavo vakashandisa masaga akazara jecha nemaba mahombe ekutakurisa mafuta emotokari kuti zvisimbise matenga edzimba dzavo asatakurwe nedutu.

en: Cyclone still 'dangerous'
sna: Dutu richiine 'njodzi'

en: Other residents of Vatomandry were stockpiling supplies in preparation for the storm.
sna: Vamwewo vagari vemuVatomandry vakange vachiunganidza zvinhu zvekushandisa vachigadzirira kuuya kwedutu iri.

en: We have been stocking up for a week, rice but also grains because with the electricity cuts we cannot keep meat or fish, said Odette Nirina, a 65-year-old hotelier in Vatomandry.
sna: Tanga tichiunganidza kwesvondo, mupunga nemabarwe negorosi, asi nekudzimwa dzimwa kemagetsi, hatisi kukwanisa kuchengeta nyama nehove, akadaro Odette Nirina uyo ava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu ari muridzi wehotera iri muVatomandry.

en: I have also stocked up on coal.
sna: Ndakaunganidzawo marasha.

en: Here we are used to cyclones, she told AFP.
sna: Kuno takajairira madutu, akaudza AFP.

en: Winds of more than 50 kph pummeled Vatomandry on Saturday morning, accompanied by intermittent rain.
sna: Mhepo dzinovhuvhuta dzichimhanya kwemamairi anodarika makumi mashanu paawa rimwe chete dzakarova Vatomandry nemusi weSvondo mangwanani, dzichiteverwa nemvura yaipota ichinaya yombokasa.

en: The disaster agency said the cyclone was expected to remain "dangerous" as it swept across the large island overnight and in the morning.
sna: Bandiko rinoshanda kubatsira panguva dzenjodzi iri rakati dutu iri raitarisirwa kuramba riine "njodzi" paraizopfuura nemuchitsuwa chikiri ichi mauro ese uye nemumangwanani.

en: Flooding is expected due to excessive rainfall in the east, southeast and central regions of the country, it warned.
sna: Madutu ari kutarisirwa nekuda kwekunaya kwemvura yakawandisa kumabvazuva, kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumabvazuva enyika nekumatunhu ari pakati penyika, yakayambira ichidaro.

en: The United Nations was ramping up its preparedness with aid agencies, placing rescue aircraft on standby and stockpiling humanitarian supplies.
sna: United Nations yakange iri mushishi kukwenenzvera gadziriro yayo mukushanda nemasangano anobatsiora panguva dzetsaona, kugarisa ndege dzinobatsira vanenge panguva dzakadai dzakagadzirira kuita basa, uyewo nekuunganida chikafu nezvimwe zvinodiwa pakubatsira vanhu vari munjodzi.

en: At least 131,000 people were affected by Ana across Madagascar in late January.
sna: Vanhu vasiri pasi pezviru zana nemakumi matatu nerimwe vakakanganiswa ne dutu Ana munyika yese yeMadagascar mukupera kwaNdira.

en: Close to 60 people were killed, mostly in the capital Antananarivo.
sna: Vanhu potse kwemakumi matanhatu vakauraiyiwa, ruzhinji rwavo muguta guru reAntananarivo.

en: That storm also hit Malawi, Mozambique and Zimbabwe, causing dozens of deaths.
sna: Dutu iri rakarovawo Malawi, Mozambique  neZimbabwe, rikakonzera ndufu dzevanhu vakati wandeyi.

en: The U.N.'s World Food Program pointed to estimates from national authorities that some 595,000 people could be directly affected by Batsirai, and 150,000 more might be displaced due to new landslides and flooding.
sna: Bazi rinoona nezvekudya kwakanaka nechikafu muU.N. reWorld Food Program rakataura pamusoro zvaitarisirwa nevakuru vemunyika dzakasiyana zvekuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu vaizokanganiswa nedutu Batsirai iri, uye czviuru zana nemakumi mashanu evanhuwo vaizobviswa munzvimbo dzananogara nekuda kwekuyerera kwevhu zhinji richifukidza misha uyewo nemafashanu emvura kwese kwese.

en: The storm poses a risk to at least 4.4 million people in one way or another, the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies said.
sna: Dutu iri rinounza njodzi dzakasiyana siyana kuvanhu vasiri pasi pemamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana mana, sangano rinobatsira munguva dzenjodzi nehondo pasi rose reInternational Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies rakadaro.

en: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
sna: Finland Inopihwa Korona Yekuva Nyika Ine Mufaro Kudarika Dzimwe Kwegore Rechishanu

en: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
sna: Finland yakanzi ndiyo nyika ine mufaro kudarika dzimwe nyika kwemakore mashuni akateedzana gore rino, muongororo yakaitwa netsigiro yeU.N., iyo yakatiwo Afghanstan ndiyo yakange yakasuruvara kudarika dzimwe zdose ichiteverwa nepedyo pedyo neLebanon.

en: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing.
sna: Serbia, Bulgaria neRomania dzakaratidza kuwedzera kuwakawanda kwerudekaro.

en: The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
sna: Kudonha kukura muMatanera Emufaro Munyika Dzepasi Rose, ayo akaburitswa neChishanu, kwakange kuri paLebanon, Venezuela neAfghanistan.

en: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
sna: Lebanon, iyo iri kutarisana nekukweshana nekuparara kwezvehupfumi, yakadonera kuva yechipiri kubva kumuswe mumanera ane nyika zana nemakumi mana nenhanhatu iri pasi zvishomanani peZimbabwe.

en: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.  U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
sna: Afghanistan, iyo iri kushungurudzwa nehondo, ndiyo iri panyasi pemanera aya, yakasangana nekuwedzera kwedambudziko revanhu vanoda kubatsirwa nekuda kwenhamo kubva maTaliban akabvuta zvakare masimba ekutonga nyika gore rakapera muna Nyamavhvhu wegore rakapera.  Bandiko reU.N. rinoona nezvevana nekudzidza kwavo reUNICEF rinofungidzira kuti vana miriyoni vari pasi pemakore mashanu vanogona kufa nenzara mumwaka wematsutso wegore rino kana vakasabatsirwa.

en: This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims, co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said. The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
sna: Manera aya anopa chiyeuchidzo chiri pachena chekuparadza kwezvinhu zvinooneka zvezvisingaoneke kana kubatika kunounzwa nehondo kuvanhu vazhinji vainokanganisa nekurwadzisa, akadaro Jan-Emmanuel De Neve munyori webhuku remanera iri raakanyora nevamwe vanyori. Ongororo Yemufaro Pasi Rose, iyo yave mugore regumi ichiburitswa, inonyorwa maringe nemaonero anoita vagari vemunyika pamusoro pemufaro wavo, uyewo uchishandisa ongororo yezvehupfumi nemagariro evnahu.

en: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period. This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
sna: Inopa zvibodzwa zvemufaro zvinobva pasina chibodzwa kusvikira pagumi, ichishandisa ongororo inenge yakaitwa kwemakore matatu akapfuura. Chuinyorwa chichongodhindiswa chakaburwa Russia isati yapinda muUkraine zvine chisimba chehondo

en: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch. The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
sna: Nyika dziri kumaodzanyemba eEurope ndidzo zvakare dzakatora zvinzimbo dzepamusoro, Denmark iri panzimbo pechipiri ichitevera Finland, kwozoteverawo Iceland, Switzerland kuchizouyawo maDutch. United States yakakwira nezvidanho zvitatu kuenda pachinzvimbo chegumi nezviotanhatu, chibodzwa chimwe pamusoro peBritain, ukuwo France ichibva yakwira kusvika pachimbo chemakumi maviri, chidanho chayo chepamusoro soro chayanga isati yambochisvikira.

en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
sna: Kuzhe kwehudekaro hwedungamunhu, uhwo hwaishandisa ongororo yaibva mukubvunza vanhu vanomiririra zvipoka nezvikwata zvakasiyana hweugari hwevanhu munyika yega yega hweGallup, zvibodzwa zvemufaro izvi zviotarisawo hupfumi hunogadzirwa nevanhu vemunyika iyi, rustigiro kumagariro akanaka evanhu zvikuri sei vanoshaiwa uyewo huwandu nehudzamu hwekuhuori hwuri mairi.

en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic. They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
sna: Gore rino vanyori vakashandisawo zvakabuda mutvsakurudzo yezvinyorwa zvemadariro ekutandararira pamadandemutande kuti iyenzanise zvinzwo zvevanhu denda reCovid risati ravepo uye mushure mekunge rauya. Vakaona "kuwedzera kwakadzama kwekutya nekusuruvara" munyika gumi nesere, asi kudererawo pakunzwa hasha.

en: The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing, report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
sna: Dzidziso yeOngororo Yemufaro Pasi Rose mumakore apfuura ndeyekuti rutsigiro mumagariro evanhu, kuva nemwoyo nermaoko ekupanana nechipavhurire mumwe kune mumwe uye kurevesa muhurumende zvakakosha kuitira rudekaro, akanyora achidaro mumwe wevanyori vegwaro iri, anonzi Jeffrey Sachs.

en: World leaders should take heed.
sna: Vatungamiriri Vepasi Vanofanirwa Kuchenjera.

en: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.
sna: Chinyorwa ichi chakonzera kusagutsikana pachakaisa Finland pachinzvimbo chekutanga muna2018.

en: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
sna: Vanhu vazhinji munyika ine vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu vanozviti vanhu vasingatane kubatwa nekusuruvara, uye kana vaona vanhu vari kuratidza mufaro wavo pane veruzvinji vanofungidzira kuti hapana kurevesa.

en: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
sna: Asi nyika iyi yemasango emiti nemadziva makurusa inozivikanwawo nehurongwa hwezvinoshandiswa neveruhinji zvinoshanda zvakaisvonakisa, dzimba dzekutambarira nekutwasanudza miviri vachidziiswa nehutsi hwemvura inopisa nekusvinwa mitezo nenyanzvi kuitira kuti pfungwa dzizorore uye kuti ropa rifambe mumuviri zvakanaka, uyewo vanovimba zvikuru muvanhu vakaiswa pazcvimbo zvesimba uyewo mune huwandu hushoma hwehugeven'a nekupara mhosva uye kusaenzana kwevanhu mumagariro.

en: Zimbabwe Court Orders Trial for NY Times Freelancer
sna: Dare Redzimhosva MuZimbabwe Rinorayira Kutongwa Kwetapi Wenhau Anombonyorera NY Times

en: A court in Zimbabwe dismissed a discharge application Tuesday in a case against a New York Times journalist. Freelance journalist Jeffrey Moyo is accused of flouting Zimbabwe's immigration laws when he allegedly helped two foreign reporters enter the southern African nation illegally last year.
sna: Rimwe dare redzimhosva muZimbabwe rakandira kunze chikumbiro chesatongwa chakaitwa neChipiri munyaya yemhosva iri kunenedzerwa mumwe mutapi wenhau weNew York Times. Mutapi wenhau anonyorera masangano enhau akasiyana siyana, journalist Jeffrey Moyo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu muZimbabwe apo achinzi akabatsira vatapi venhau vekune dzimwe nyika vaviri kuti vapinde munyika iyi iri kuchamhembe kweAfrica zviri kunze kwemutemo gore rakapera.

en: Kathleen Mpofu one of Moyo's lawyers said the journalist will go on trial April 28.
sna: Kathleen Mpofu mumwe wemagweta aMoyo akati mutapi wenhau uyu achamira pamberi pedare kuti atongwe musi wa28 Kubvumbi.

en: The magistrate dismissed the application. He basically found that the state had led enough evidence for Mr. Moyo to be put to his defense and coming to this finding, Mpofu told VOA from Bulawayo, via WhatsApp.
sna: Mutongi wedare redzimhosva akaramba kugamuchira chikumbiro chekusatongwa. Akaona kuti vachuchusi vehurumende vakane vaunza humboo hwakakwana zvekuti vaMoyo vanofanirwa kuzvidavirira, uye pakusvika pavakaona izvi, Mpofu akaudza VOA ari kuBulawayo, achishandisa WhatsApp.

en: It seems the magistrate relied on the fact that the state had led the evidence of the allegedly false accreditation cards that had been obtained by the foreign journalist and based on his interpretation of the evidence led by the state, he found that it was sufficient to put the accused to his defense.
sna: Zvinoita sekuti mutongi akashandisa zvekuti vachuchusi vehurumende vakange vatungamidza mberi zvinonzi zvitupa zvekuita basa zvisiri zvechokwadi zvakange zvawanikwa nemutapi wekunze kwenyika, uye achishandisa kunzwisisa kwake kwehumboo hwakaturwa nevachuchusi vehurumende, akaona zvakakwana kuti nyakupomerwa mhosva azvidavirire zvaari kupomerwa.

en: Moyo's lawyers believed the case might be dismissed, after the same court earlier this month acquitted a Zimbabwe Media Commission official, Thabang Manhika, for allegedly processing fake accreditations for two South Africa-based New York Times journalists who entered Zimbabwe and were later deported. Moyo and Manhika were being tried separately.
sna: Magweta aMoyo vaivimba kuti nyaya iyi yazokandwa kunze kwedare, mushure medare rimwe chete rati mumwe mushandi weZimbabwe Media Commission official, Thabang Manhika, akange asina mhosva yekugadzira zvitupa zvenhema zvekupa vatapi venhau vaviri vekuSouth Africa vanoshandira New York Times vakange vapinda muZimbabwe asi mushure kwava kuzodzingwa munyika. Moyo naManhika vakange vachitongwa vakapatsanurwa, mumuwe nemumwe sedungamunhu.

en: Zimbabwe's government says both Moyo and Manhika broke immigration laws.
sna: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti vese Moyo naManhika vakatyora mitemo yekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu.

en: Information Ministry Permanent Secretary Ndabaningi Nick Mangwana commented on Tuesday's ruling.
sna: Munyori mukuru mubazi rekufambiswa kwemashoko Ndabaningi Nick Mangwana akataura pamusoro pemutongo wakaitwa neChipiri uyu.

en: We just want to see that there's law and order.
sna: Taingoda kuona kuti pane mutemo nekugadzikana kwezvinhu.

en: If somebody has committed a crime or is perceived, they will have their day in court, so he is having his day in court, so his outcome is not in our hands, it's in the hands of the criminal justice system.
sna: Kana mumwe mnhu akapara mhosva kana kuti ari kuonekwa seakapara mhisva, vachawana zuva ravo rekuzvidavirira mudare redzimhosva, saka awana zuva rake mudare redzimhosva, saka zvichaitika kwaari hazvisi mumaoko edu, zviri mumaoka ehurongwa hwemitemo inotonga nekururamisa panenge patyorwa mutemo.

en: That's our position, Mangwana said.
sna: Ndiwo maonero edu, Mangwana akadaro.

en: Tabani Moyo of the Media Institute of Southern Africa, or MISA, has called for the journalist to be treated fairly.
sna: Tabani Moyo wesangano rezvenhau rekuchamhembe kweAfrica reMedia Institute of Southern Africa, kana kuti MISA, akati mutapi wenhau uyu anofanirwa kutongwa nenzira yekururamisira pasi divi rinotorwa nevatongi.

en: MISA Zimbabwe underscores the need for fair trial.
sna: MISA Zimbabwe inosimbisa kuti panofanirwa kuva nekutonga kwekuyenzanisira.

en: That is our position throughout till the end of the case.
sna: Ndiwo maonero edu kusvikira nyaya iyi yapera.

en: All we are saying is that he, just like any other citizen, deserves a fair trial, Moyo said.
sna: Zvese zvatiri kutaura ndezvekuti iye, semumwewo mugari wemunyika anofanirwa kutongwa nenzira inoenzanisira ,akadaro Moyo.

en: Moyo, a Zimbabwean national, faces up to 10 years in prison if convicted.
sna: Moyo, chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe, anogona kugara mujeri kwemakore gumi kana akawanikwa aine mhosva.

en: Zimbabwe Police Block Main Opposition Rallies
sna: Mapurisa EmuZimbabwe Anodzivisa Misangano Yebato Rinopikisa

en: Zimbabwe police Saturday blocked the country's main opposition party from holding rallies ahead of March 26 elections to fill seats that have fallen vacant since the general election in 2018.
sna: Mapurisa emuZimbabwe neMugovera akadzivisa bato guru rinopikisa mukuita misangano nevatsigiri vayo pamberi pesarudzo dichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume kuti zvigaro zvisisina vamiririri kubva paitwa sarudzo dzevamiriri muna 2018.

en: The police says the rally ban in Mavhunga, about 80 kilometers east of Harare, is meant to ensure peace and stability.
sna: Mapurisa anoti kudziviswa kwemusangano kuMavhunga, mufambo ungasvike makiromita makumi masere kumabvazuva eHarare, kwaitirwa kuti pave nerunyararo nekugadzikana.

en: Police camped overnight Friday at a venue in Marondera, where the leader of Zimbabwes main opposition, the Citizens Coalition for Change, Nelson Chamisa, was supposed to address his supporters Saturday.
sna: Mapurisa akaita musasa wavo husiku hwese pane imwe nzvimbo yekuunganira nemusi weChishanu muMarondera, umo mutungamiriri webato guru rinopikisa muZimbabwe, the Citizens Coalition for Change, Nelson Chamisa, akange achifanirwa kutaura kuvatsigiri vake neMugovera.

en: The 44-year-old candidate later came to disperse the crowd waiting for him.
sna: Murume wemakore makumi mana nemana arikudawo kukwikwidza pakuva mutungamiriri wenyika akazouya kuzoudza gungano rakange rakamumiririra kuti richidzokera haro kudzimba.

en: We are a party of peace, a party of the rule of law, he said.
sna: Tiri bato rerunyararo,  bato rekutonga kwemutemo, akadaro.

en: Chamisa said his party does not want to fight with people.
sna: Chamisa akati bato rake haridi kurwa nevanhu.

en: He said the government denied permission to hold a rally, so the party asked for permission to come and tell about that.
sna: Akati hurumende yakaramba kupa mvumo yekuita musangano, saka bato rake rakamukumbira kuti auye ataure pamusoro penyaya iyi.

en: He told his supporters he does not want the politics of Zimbabwe to cause any death.
sna: Akaudza vatsigiri vake kuti haadi kuti zvematongerwo zveZimbabwe zvikonzere rufu.

en: Then he added that what the government does not know is that here in Marondera, his arrival is good enough.
sna: Akawedzerazve kuti chisingazivikanwe nehurumende ndechekuti muno muMarondera, kusvika kwake chete kwakatokwana.

en: In an interview Sunday, Fadzayi Mahere, the Citizens Coalition for Change spokeswoman said her party was not happy with the bias of the Zimbabwe Electoral Commission and the police in favor of the ruling ZANU-PF.
sna: Mukubvunzwa mibvunzo nevatapi venhau nemusi weSvondo, Fadzayi Mahere, mutauririkadzi weCitizens Coalition for Change akati bato rake haris kufadzwa nekurerekera kudivi rimwe chete kwe bazi rinofambisa sarudzo muZimbabwe, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission nemapurisa vachitsigira bato riri kutonga reZANU-PF.

en: Our rally in Marondera was purportedly banned and yet ZANU-PF was car rally and other unsanctioned in the very same area, she said.
sna: Musangano wedu unonzi wakadziviswa asi ZANU PF yanga iine musangano wanga uchiitwa nemotokari dzakadungamidzana munzvimbo imwe cheteyo, akadaro.

en: "Not once have they sought authorization or given notice to the police, yet these unlawful prohibitions are meted out against us.
sna: "Hapana musi kana mumwe wavakakumbira mvumo kana kusuma mapurisa, asi kudziviswa uku kuri kunze kwemutemo kunoregedzerwa kwatiri.

en: Ours is a struggle of non-violent resistance.
sna: Yedu ihondo yekudzivisa tisingashandise mhirizhonga.

en: However, the thousands that came out just to hear president Chamisa speak shows beyond any doubt that the citizens are prepared to do whatever it takes to reclaim their dignity.
sna: Zvisineyi, zviuru zvange zvauya kuzonzwa mutingamiriri Chamisa vachitaura zvaratidza pasina kukahadzika kuti vagari vakagadzirira kuita zvose zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuti vabvute hunhu nekukudzikana kwavo.

en: We continue to urge supporters to register to vote in their masses so that we attain our target in 2023: A landslide victory."
sna: Tinoramba tichikurudzira vatsigiri vedu kuti vanonyoresa nehuwandu hwavo kuvagone kusarudza vatungamiriri nevamiririri vavanoda kuti tizadzikise chinangwa chedu muna2023: Kukunda kwakazara pasina kupokana."

en: Zimbabwe police Sunday refused to comment on the ban of the Citizens Coalition for Change in Marondera.
sna: Mapurisa emuZimbabwe neSvondo akaramba kutaura pamusoro rekudziviswa kweCitizens Coalition for Change muMarondera. Vakazotura tsamba kumusangano unokwikwidza vachiti vaida nguva yekugadzirira kuti pave nerunyararo pamusangano uyu. Masvondo maviri apfuura, mvongamupopoto nekurovana kwakatangwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigir veZANU-PF pamusangano weCitizens Coalition for Change wakasiya kwafa vanhu vaviri nevazhinji vakuvadzwa.

en: It issued a letter to the opposition saying it needed time to prepare to ensure there was peace at the rally.
sna: Vakazotura tsamba kumusangano unokwikwidza vachiti vaida nguva yekugadzirira kuti pave nerunyararo pamusangano uyu.

en: Two weeks ago, violence instigated by suspected ruling ZANU-PF supporters at a Citizens Coalition for Change rally resulted in two deaths and dozens injured.
sna: Masvondo maviri apfuura, mvongamupopoto nekurovana kwakatangwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigir veZANU-PF pamusangano weCitizens Coalition for Change wakasiya kwafa vanhu vaviri nevazhinji vakuvadzwa.

en: Alexander Rusero, a former senior politics lecturer at Harare Polytechnic college, says police and political parties must thwart violence at opposition rallies.
sna: Alexander Rusero, uyo aimbova mudzidzisi mukuru munezvematongerwo anoti mapurisa nemapato ezvematongerwo anofanirwa kudzivisa kurwisana pamaungano emabato.

en: Police have arrested 16 suspected ZANU-PF supporters who are accused of causing the violence and who now face murder charges in connection with the deaths at the opposition rally.
sna: Mapurisa akasunga vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZANU-PF avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera zhowezhowe uye vatarisana nekupomerwa mhosva dzehumhondi dzakanangana nendufu dzakaitika pamusangano uyu wevatsigiri vebato rinokwikwidza.

en: Zimbabwes pre-election season has been marred by violence that has claimed lives and left thousands injured since 2000 after a strong opposition party emerged.
sna: Nguva inoteverwa nesarudzo inomaranzurwa nemvongamupopoto nekukuvadzana zvinosiya zvatora hupenyu hwevanhu nekusiya zviuru zvakuvadzwa kubva mugore ra2000 mushure mekusimuka kwebato rinokwikwidza rakasimba.
